pull.title: rpcwallet: Replace boost::optional<T>::emplace with simple assignment of T{}

verification.payload:
tree 8515a7e25084c508d014397baa62413dd582db79
parent 88d8b4e182bfc75e8496f7046af7aab93307b9d0
author MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1589205572 -0400
committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1589205229 -0400

rpcwallet: Replace boost::optional<T>::emplace with simple assignment of T{}

Optional::emplace() was only added in boost 1.56, see
https://github.com/boostorg/optional/commit/2e583aaf30964afd66c1284aa71d0d8b42fa440d

To simply work around https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/18943,
replace it with assignment of T{}

tree 1df7c45bfb70d76950a9912157d67f7b2f119aa7
parent fa182a8794cbf9be1aa91d1d75e65bc7800156bc
author MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1589205950 -0400
committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1589205540 -0400

rpcwallet: Replace pwallet-> with wallet.

pwallet is never null everywhere where it is dereferenced, so simply
replace it with a reference, which can not be null by definition.

events.message:
rpcwallet: Replace pwallet-> with wallet.

pwallet is never null everywhere where it is dereferenced, so simply
replace it with a reference, which can not be null by definition.

events.body: Code review ACK fa1f840596554ed264d11ee3b3643bf99eb57eb5 and thanks for using a standalone commit for the fix
